feed.title: Track Awesome Eta Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: :star: Useful resources for the Eta programming language

entry.title: Awesome Eta Updates on Aug 19 - Aug 25, 2019
entry.content:
Information / Talks

  • Introduction to Eta - Introduction by the creator of Eta.
  • Haskell for JVM - Talk at LambdaConf about porting a language to the JVM.

Tools / Talks

  • IntelliJ Eta (⭐52) - Plugin for IntelliJ.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Aug 19 - Aug 25, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Eta Updates on Sep 24 - Sep 30, 2018
entry.content:
Introduction / Overview

  • GitHub (⭐2.6k) - Eta on GitHub.
  • Philosophy - Interview about the philosophy behind Eta's development.

Introduction / First Steps

  • Prelude (⭐7) - Default modules for an easier start.

Introduction / Official Resources

  • Eta Blog: Java I - Using Eta with Java, part I.
  • Eta Blog: Java II - Using Eta with Java, part II.
  • Eta Blog: Haskell - Using Haskell packages in Eta code.
  • Eta Blog: Scala - Using Eta code in Scala projects.

Tools / Talks

  • sbt (⭐57) - Plugin for integrating Eta into Scala.
  • gradle (⭐30) - Gradle plugin for Eta projects.

Sample Applications / Android

  • eta-android-2048 (⭐58) - The 2048 game for Android.

Sample Applications / Web

  • eta-todo (⭐17) - Example of a Spock web application written in Eta.
  • eta-yesod-minimal (⭐5) - Example of a Yesod web application in Eta.
entry.summary: 12 awesome projects updated on Sep 24 - Sep 30, 2018

entry.title: Awesome Eta Updates on Jan 29 - Feb 04, 2018
entry.content:
Introduction / Overview

  • Eta - Official website.

Introduction / Comparisons

  • Eta vs. Haskell - Differences between Eta and Haskell.
  • Eta vs. Frege - Differences between Eta and Frege.

Introduction / Compatibility

  • Template Haskell - Status of Template Haskell.
  • GHC 8 - Compatibility with GHC 8.

Introduction / Official Resources

  • FAQ - Frequently asked questions.

Information / Articles

  • InfoWorld - Short article about Eta.
  • Jaxenter - Functional programming made easy: Here comes Eta.

Information / Blogs

  • Eta programming language - Official blog.

Information / Talks

  • Functional Conf - 2016 - Bringing the Power of Haskell to the JVM.
  • Functional Conf - 2017 - Eta Fibers: Towards Better Concurrency on the JVM.
